contenido:
The SanDisk 64GB Extreme PRO SDXC UHS-I is a solid choice for users looking for dependable storage with fast read and write speeds. It offers read speeds up to 170MB/s and write speeds up to 90MB/s, which is more than sufficient for most photography and Full HD/4K video recording needs.

The build quality feels sturdy, and the card is marketed as temperature-proof, waterproof, shockproof, and X-ray-proof ‚Äî making it suitable for various shooting environments. Compatibility is broad, working seamlessly with DSLRs, mirrorless cameras, and even some video cameras.

While it performs well in most scenarios, professional users working with high-bitrate 4K or RAW video might find UHS-II cards more suitable due to their higher sustained write speeds. However, for the price point and performance, this card offers excellent value.
